skill.name: video-generation-skill
skill.description: Design video concepts, scripts, shotlists, transitions, and editing notes for VEO, Gemini, and Nano Banana-based pipelines. Use when turning a marketing idea into concrete video assets.
skill.summary: Design video concepts, scripts, shotlists, transitions, and editing notes for VEO, Gemini, and Nano ...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown content. No executable code, no network calls, no filesystem operations, no external commands. Risk-free for marketplace distribution.

content.user_title: Design marketing video concepts and scripts
content.value_statement: Marketing teams struggle to translate ideas into video-ready plans. This skill provides structured frameworks for hooks, scripts, shotlists, and platform-specific guidelines across YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and LinkedIn.
actual_capabilities: Design video hooks and opening sequences
Create full scripts and scene-by-scene breakdowns
Generate platform-specific guidelines for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn
Structure video content for short-form (15-60s) and long-form (2-10 min) formats
limitations: Does not generate actual video files
Does not integrate with video APIs or rendering tools
Requires manual execution of video creation via external tools
No audio or music recommendations beyond platform sound guidelines

use_cases.title: Plan campaign videos
use_cases.description: Transform marketing briefs into detailed video plans with scripts and shotlists.

use_cases.title: Structure social clips
use_cases.description: Create platform-optimized video concepts for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts.

use_cases.title: Develop YouTube content
use_cases.description: Design long-form videos with hooks, summaries, and CTAs for YouTube channels.

prompt_templates.title: Quick social video
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a 30-second TikTok video about [product/topic]. Include hook, problem, solution, and CTA.

prompt_templates.title: YouTube explainer
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan a 5-minute YouTube video on [topic]. Include hook, intro, 3 main points, summary, and CTA.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-platform campaign
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a video content plan that adapts a single idea into YouTube, TikTok, and LinkedIn formats.

prompt_templates.title: Thumbnail and title
prompt_templates.prompt: Design thumbnail concepts and titles for a [platform] video about [topic] following platform best practices.

output_examples.input: Create a 30-second Instagram Reels video for our new productivity app launch
output: HOOK (0-3s): Quick pattern interrupt showing the problem
CTA (25-30s): Download link and sound advice

best_practices: Start with a strong hook in the first 3-5 seconds
Match video structure to platform and audience expectations
Always include captions for silent viewing
anti_patterns: Using long-form structures on short-form platforms
Skipping the CTA or leaving it too late

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram Reels, Facebook Reels, LinkedIn, and YouTube Shorts.

faq.question: What video lengths can I plan?
faq.answer: Short-form (15-60 seconds) and long-form (2-10 minutes) with custom structures.

faq.question: Does this skill create videos?
faq.answer: No. It creates detailed plans, scripts, and shotlists for execution in external video tools.

faq.question: Is data stored or shared?
faq.answer: No. This skill only generates text-based plans. Any storage follows your workspace policies.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes. The frameworks are adaptable. Modify hooks, scenes, and CTA timing for your needs.

faq.question: How is this different from a video editor?
faq.answer: This skill designs the plan. Video editors execute the edit. Use both for complete workflows.
